job_history.work_description: Manage student learning needs. Create Curriculum for IT Program. Manage two part time instructors. Teach three classes of twenty-two students each class per day. Manage open entry/open exit curriculum for all training in the program. Verify training outcome reports to maintain COE standards. Data metric analysis of student progress throughout the course. Answer questions of potential students and parents. Review and update training standards as needed. New curriculum development according to market requirements Customer service training tailored towards IT students Partner with fellow instructors to provide cross training and student interaction Work with student services to assure student success Counsel students on learning methods and methods for improvement.

Manage incoming troubleshooting calls from four state agencies. Assisted help desk staff members in resolving customer requests with first call resolution. Create and specify computer standards for the Utah Dept. of Health. Trained fourteen help desk staff members on help desk phone client installation and usage. Software management for Dept. of Health. Manage new user creation procedure for state departments of Health & Natural Resources. Created new user training documentation for thirty help desk staff members in the State of Utah. Provide remote control support for customers throughout the state.

Prepare training curriculum for preparedness trainings. Designed eighteen computer based training courses for the department of Health's management staff training over one hundred managers providing significant cost savings. Coordinated information technology needs for fifty preparedness staff members. Designed cover art and the multimedia presentations to give trainees after sessions, prepared over one thousand take home packets for various trainings. Served as technical lead staff member for the Utah Department of Health's training and education center.

Provided advanced level technical support for department staff in computer repair and service. Inventory control for department of health hardware. Created Technology standards for division of Health systems improvement. Served on advisory committee for mobile device policy creation. Updated department travel system from paper to online.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience managing multiple projects and teams, including curriculum development, training programs, and help desk operations, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has led teams in various roles, including managing part-time instructors, help desk staff, and coordinating IT needs for large groups, indicating strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Training and Development
skills.explanation: Has created and implemented numerous training programs, including curriculum development, customer service training, and technical training, showing expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Technical Support
skills.explanation: Has provided advanced technical support for department staff, managed help desk operations, and created technology standards, indicating strong proficiency in technical support.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: Has performed data metric analysis of student progress and created reports to maintain COE standards, showing a solid working proficiency in data analysis.

skills.name: Curriculum Development
skills.explanation: Has created and implemented numerous curricula for IT programs, showing expert-level mastery in curriculum development.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Has provided customer service training tailored towards IT students and managed customer requests, showing a solid working proficiency in customer service.

skills.name: Software Management
skills.explanation: Has managed software for the Dept. of Health and created new user training documentation, showing a solid working proficiency in software management.

skills.name: Multimedia Design
skills.explanation: Has designed cover art and multimedia presentations, showing a solid working proficiency in multimedia design.
